sub_title: Global CP Lead IT Productivity - Contracting & Procurement (Shell Global Solutions International BV)
summary: All-round IT Manager with over 25 years experience working in the oil & energy industry. Skilled in People Management, Asset/Application Portfolio Rationalization, Sourcing/Supplier Management, Resource Management, Business & Data Intelligence, Fraud Detection and Risk & Controls Management. Strong Information Technology professional with a certificate focused in ITIL Foundation v 3.0.

education.grade: Cijfer 8 | Delft - The Hague (ism. Open University)

education.field_of_study: 5 Days Executive MBA for Managers - IIR Management Development

profile_positions.description:
@ Global Category Manager Hardware

@ Contract Management Apple mobile devices & 
     Audio Visual products & services
@ Performance Management Productivity category
@ Global CP IT Productivity strategy
profile_positions.title: Global CP Lead IT Productivity - Contract & Procurement (SGSI BV)

profile_positions.description:
@ Delivery of high quality IT Strategic Plan for NAM at Operating Unit (OU) Level in November 2020 with short, medium and long term IT Strategical views/capabilities (including Transformation) linked to Asset Improvement Plan and Groningen Gas field closure in 2023.
@ VP CIO Award for Cash Preservation work during COVID-19 pandemic – driving Contingent Workforce cost reduction across the organization globally (+15$M saved).
@ Lead & streamline RM process, Foundation for Future migration and team of 2 FTE & green KPIs in Service Now R4.
@ Competitive IT Functional Lead of Asset Portfolio Management team (3 FTEs) and jr Strategy Analyst (1 FTE) in Application Rationalization context via agile sprints.
@ Implementation of Business Proximate Sourcing strategy for non-Hub Asset/OU locations across UPIGNE IT LoBs in co-operation with Enterprise IT RM team.
@ Lead a joint Resource Management BAU transition on behalf of 3 IT CoBs for IT Executive to endorse Business Proximate RM transition to central Enterprise RM (ERM) team. 
@ RM Persona Champion of UPIGNE IT in interface with central ITBM team and ERM, driving monthly RM Super User cadences as face-up towards ERM and S&P.
@ Strategy & Integration face-up with Deepwater & Functions (DW&F) Line of Business S&P Manager. 
@ Drive/deliver Strategical External Insights/Competitive Intelligence papers on "Connected Planning", "Sourcing Strategy ERP/Functions" and "Well Office" to DW&F IT Managers.
@ Drive agile IT Productivity & Base Cost improvement activities in close collaboration with various stakeholders via Azure DevOps. 
@ Workforce Plan Strategy owner and face-up with IT Engineering and Enterprise IT.
profile_positions.title: Strategy & Integration Advisor - Strategy & Planning (SITI BV)

profile_positions.description:
@ Team Lead of 2 people and LT member of UPIGNE IT Investment & Planning LT in S&P with Workforce Planning, Contingent Workforce & Sourcing/Resource Management in portfolio.
@ Lead Contingent Workforce transition from UPIGNE IT Hubs to IT Engineering in IT Evolution. 
@ Secretary UPIGNE IT Sourcing Board driving first class ADR, FTE, Priority Supplier, HCC and KAS MI reporting, KPIs and dashboards of Staff, Contractors & Vacancies (leading KPIs across RDS IT for years).
@ Design an UPIGNE IT Sourcing Strategy to deliver business value goals on dimension of Build / Borrow / Buy by skill and provide Hub vs Proximate dimension.
@ Global Sourcing interfaces with CP, CSD, HR, Business IT, Planners, Delivery Vertical Managers, LoB ITMs, IT Engineering and Architecture etc. to manage High Cost Contractors (HCC) step-outs and exit-strategy.
@ Project lead of data quality & improvement project, training and transition from MRL (Master Resource List) to market standard IQN process in India/Bangalore to phase out custom-build MRL.
@ Delivery of Supplier-Skillset Sourcing matrix & selection tree for KAS, Contract Labour and Preferred/Priority suppliers.
@ Drive Priority Supplier cadences with TCS & Wipro with quarterly State of Union / KPI dashboard.
@ Delivery and design of self-service OU Benchmarking tool in Excel to close ITBM + FSB global CAT1/2/3 cost recovery / reporting gaps per Asset with Sponsor/Spender hierarchy by LoB/OU
@ Definition and framing Product Line Management (PLM) Sourcing Strategy
@ Ambassador Resource Management module UPIGNE IT in Service Now R2-R3.
profile_positions.title: Sourcing / Resource Management Lead - Strategy & Planning (SIEP BV)

profile_positions.description:
@ Ensure Sourcing Strategy for the Delivery organisation are met or step-outs are approved.
@ Drive and initiate KPI/MI dashboards for Upstream IT Sourcing.
@ Demand and Third Party resource management via IQN.
@ Ambassador Cost Performance Improvement (CPI) Programme Shell Upstream IT. 
@ Responsible for successful driving of CPI programme parts in area of Application Portfolio Management (+1500 applications) to meet pre-defined CPI targets for delivery in terms of cost take-out, cost avoidance and / or performance improvement.
@ Program scope include portfolio reviews, improvement initiatives and co-ordination of implementation projects executed in the Delivery organisation with support from Service Operations Management (SOM) and other IT services in the Group.
profile_positions.title: Senior BA Strategic Projects - IT Transformation & Sourcing (SIEP BV)

profile_positions.description:
@ Manage global Customer Value Technology (CVT) in-flight service onboarding projects from Transition to Support (T2S) within Technical Landscape Services organisation as operational arm of Projects and Technology (TaCIT) for the Shell Downstream business (i.e. Smart Transport and B2B programmes).
@ Delivered 13 AtOs over ~2 years time without significant escalations. 
@ Interface with virtually and geographically spread professional CVT service development project teams in Malaysia, India, Egypt, UK, Mid-East, China, US and Europe.
@ Service Management (conform ITIL directives).
@ Vendor/Supplier management Infrastructure Service providers (ISPs) like AT&T, T-Systems, IBM, Logica, Microsoft etc.
profile_positions.title: Service Development & Deployment Project Manager (TaCIT/PT SOM)

profile_positions.description:

@ Role model participant in fishbowls (informal eye-opener debates) with senior leadership teams.
@ Linking-pin and senior advisor of international enABLE networks in US, Brazil and UK.
profile_positions.title: Chairman Shell enABLE NL (Shell Nederland BV)

profile_positions.description:
@ Enterprise Controls Management in the area of Information Management Technology throughout Royal Dutch Shell Plc. 
@ High Touch roll-out project management + delivery of global Virtual Collaboration Platform (VCP) to x-IRM Community through SharePoint 2010 (+2500 target business users & IT delivery stakeholders).
@ Deputy Team Lead of Controls Management Team.
@ Part of the central Risk & Controls team managing strategic Risk & Control objectives, lifecycle, implementation and application within the business in conformance with amongst others external Industry standards like BS ISO 2700x, COBIT etc. 
@ Change & Communications Lead OneIT Control Framework (major project with many stakeholders triggering considerable cost savings).
@ Social Media Subject Matter Expert & stakeholder management.
@ Internal Communications Improvement Lead Central IRM cross-team wise.
profile_positions.title: Group Information Risk Management (SI BV)

profile_positions.description:
@ Global Fraud Prevention & Mitigation within the fuel & credit card business of Shell Group (Europe, Far East, Oceania and LA), 
@ Bringing European Fraud best practices ad-hoc to next (global) level, 
@ Rolled out in 80% of global countries by mid 2009, 
@ Leading development traject of numerous intelligent "business thresolds" to support implementation of the global fraud detection tool to be operated by a centralised Fraud team from Malaysia, 
@ Nestor of growing Shell card fraud skillpool and expertise within Shell Downstream,
@ Saved global Shell Downstream Retail businesses millions $ with geographically spread virtual team of fraud professionals on annual basis, tracked by monthly one-pager dashboard KPI/KGIs, 
@ Leading setup + conduct of global online fraud training exam programme to Manila and Capetown to off-shored shared service centers.
profile_positions.title: Global Fraud Management (SDSI BV)

profile_positions.description:
@ Setup/management of European Fraud Control Network, 
@ Coordinating/giving numerous presentations and trainings on fraud prevention best practices and tools in +35 European countries where Shell Retail is located, 
@ Awarded with Shell Retail EVP Award for mitigating major fraud attack in Italy in September 2004,
@ Permanent member of FICFIB (Fuel Industry Card Fraud Investigation Bureau) at Europol, 
@ Coordination of business intelligence based fraud detection reports via amongst others Datamining and Artificial Intelligence. 
@ Saved Retail business tons of $ on annual basis in Europe.
profile_positions.title: European Fraud Avoidance Manager (SEOP BV)

profile_positions.description:
@ Project lead Fraud Management workaround, i.e setting up Fraud Reporting work flow and mechanism, Analytical "home-grown" tools with MS Excel, Business Objects/Intelligence to support the European Shell Europe Oil Products Fraud Manager,
@ Coordination of IT implementation traject of euroShell Portal as rolled out in +22 EU countries,
@ Coordination of IT implementation traject of Loadbroking (delivery of transport throughout Europe via intelligent software to support logistic shipping + supply chain channels),
@ Coordination of IT implementation traject of euroShell Online (eSO) and euroShell Fuel Logic (offline equivalent of eSO).
profile_positions.title: e-Business Project Manager (SNV BV)

profile_positions.description:
See e-Business Project Manager role; but working on Operations Management level:

@ Web Content Manager Intranet (SWW) and euroShell Portal (WWW), co-ordinated developments of new e-Commerce / B2C functionalities and better userfriendly navigation in close co-operation with SEOP CRT/Fleet Management and Shell Consumer (Shell Capital Ltd),
@ e-Commerce Operations and System Development Management responsibility of euroShell Online, an online Fleet and CRT Fuel and Card Management Information tool on Extranet with SSL3 (certificate encryption) in all European countries in which the euroShell card is used and accepted in order to view and manage the transactions via Internet by the big CRT and Fleet Management companies,
@ Responsible for liaison with Atos Origin on euroShell Fuel Logic operational matters with Shell in BeNeLux regions,
@ Leading operational interface with Shell Information Technology International (SSI/SITI) engineers and project leads to maintain and launch new e-commerce application versions like euroShell Online, CMI (Cards Management Information RDBMS).
profile_positions.title: e-Commerce Operations Manager (SNV BV)

profile_positions.description:
@ Service Development Project Global Discussion Groups/Forums; feasibility study and market research done in order to develop Web Forum Service, a global and shared web collaboration discussion forum tool) launched 1st May 1998 with a number of Shell companies globally. 
@ Fee/contribution earnings of this young service since its launch has grown to Dfl.780K annually by November 1999
@ Project Management, coordination and care for proper Y2K assessment / compliance progress c.q. transformation of all Shell Wide Web and WWW hosted services within EU/AF region. 
@ Service Development and Project Management of a new improved and solid global shared Web Reporting Service tool as low-end E2E solution for regional Shell IT Delivery Teams globally to track, trace, analyse, report and measure web logfiles as founded metrics in aid of their regional customers, webmasters for Marketing purposes (CRM) etc.
profile_positions.title: Service Development Manager (SSI BV)

profile_positions.description:
@ Het goedkeuren van de strategie van de stichting, getoetst aan de statuten van de stichting Nederlands Gebarencentrum (NGc).

@ Het afleggen van verantwoording aan de maatschappelijke omgeving van de instelling.
profile_positions.title: Member of The Supervisory Board

profile_positions.description:
@ Chair meetings with involvement of Hogeschool Utrecht - NGT, UWV, Tolknet, NBTG, STRG, St. Plotsdoven, Dovenschap, Kentalis etc.
@ Aim of meetings is to act as mortar between the stones of involved stakeholders and get aligned on common objectives like quality of sign language interpreters, scribes, service by TolkNet and work improvement gaps in aid of the deaf and HoH as target group in NL.
@ Given the differences in interests of stakeholders it has been challenging to find common sense and get the parties on the same page with regard to the way forward.
@ Research by NBTG with factual figures acted as baseline to an improved service framework for LCC.
@ LCC got disbanded due to economy measures from UWV by end of 2008 and discussions will be led from another platform.
profile_positions.title: Chairman National Clients Council for Info & Communication Services
